text:
Hiep Thi Le (; November 30, 1971 – December 19, 2017) was a Vietnamese-American actress. She was known for her role in "Heaven & Earth" (1993). She appeared in "Bugis Street" (1995, released in the United States in 1997) and co-starred in the little-scene "Dead Man Can't Dance" (1997).
On February 23, 2014, Le appeared on the Food Network game show "Chopped", appearing and competing in the eighteenth-season episode "Beer Here!".
Le died on December 19, 2017 in Los Angeles, California from stomach cancer at the age of 46.
